New: On the overview page there is now a photo picker mode in order to edit several photos at once (multi edit)
Exif data is reduced to technical values and can be expanded to show general information
Description can be added to photo
New layout for detail page of photos
Photos will be shown in full size
New photos will only be show the the member, until he edits it

Fixed: Photo thumnbnails are now a link and can be opened in a new browser window via context menu
On moving between photos with the left and right key, changes made before are shown
On the overview page loading of more photos doesn't stop on scaling down anymore
New: Keywords will be matched to existing categries and topics if possible. If a keyword cannot be matched NO new topic will be created.
Added possibility to update existing photos via upload. See the new menu item on the photo page.
A new option has been add to update existing photos when uploading or synchronising photos. In order for this to work the name of the file has to match the name of existing photo.
Photos which cannot be processed will be moved to Glitch-Folder
Set visible area of your photo
Scaling on overview is now stored in a cookie to preserve it

Fixed: Rotation of photo will be recognized if Exif-data is avaliable and picture ajdusted accordingly
Date values are read correctly from Exif-data
Synchronizing via dropbox webhook will not create multiple folders anymore
New: Photo page: Move to previous or next photo via button or hotkey|https://trello.com/c/sViddicI/260-darius-foto-cursor-nachstes-vorheriges-bild-in-chronologischer-reihenfolge
New dismiss button on notifications
Photos title in browsers title bar
Photo title will be displayed in notifications

Fixed: Annoying subpixel problem on startpage and overview grids solved
New: Lazy load feature on Overview|https://trello.com/c/GxIxiDzS/55-overview-lazyload
New implementation of lazy load feature on stacked pages like Journal, Categories and others
New size ratios for portrait and landscape photos on stacked pages
Overview has now two different views: Grid and List
Overview has a new scale control, to easily adjust the width of the photos in the grid

Fixed: Every responsive breakpoint has now its own number of photos on the startpage, regarding a percentage width|https://trello.com/c/BTNwa49s/248-sandra-zecchino-kachelgrosse-selbt-wahlen
New: Introduction of the photo attribute 'Is for stories only', to prevent showing a photo in the public collections
Browser-independent tooltips on image buttons
Slideshow button on every stacked page, like Journal, Categories, ...|https://trello.com/c/ILSYuNAP/249-sandra-zecchino-diashow

Fixed: Photos disappear after sync on GoogleDrive and OneDrive|https://trello.com/c/jWAfXi86/244-ivan-andric-fotos-verschwunden
New: START OF THIS CHANGELOG
Implementation of HTML templates für mail notifications
Showing the amount of stars in rating mail notification|https://trello.com/c/hSVR3NWv/217-sandra-zecchino-in-notification
Hash routing for the tabs on the dashboard
Auto-sizing of the dashboard tabs in multiple rows according to the canvas width
